bug.description:
This issue aggregates build issues and contain multiple sub-tasks
make setup - This script installs various applications and packages in the local machine. Have a dedicated, transparent, and infomative script(s) that installs the requirements in a virtual environment/ conda env. use clang explicitly as the compiler at macOS builds. libtorch-cpu-macos-x86_64-1.4.0 does not compile with GCC (tested with Homebrew GCC 9.3.0_1 and macOS Mojave)
